name: August Walk
description:
The game has three story branches: normal, realistic, and mystical walk.
In the normal branch you can just walk around the summer city, the forest and the spring.

In the realistic branch be careful, the map is flooded with blood, there are 9 scary endings and foul language. Pay attention to the red eyes - these are the endings.
Choose your path and unlock all the endings. You can move with the map to different locations. The game has an abandoned camp, a river, a summer town, a forest, a spring. There are 11 endings in the mystical branch and 9 in the realistic one.

The girl took her camera and went for a walk on a sunny August day. It's only up to you to decide how it will turn out - whether it will be an ordinary walk to an abandoned camp, or she will meet a terrible end.



Features:
- pleasant graphics;
- simple controls;
- interesting gameplay;
